plot.content:
This plot reveals a new generator called "Field". The whole area is used with lines following a strong field formed with repetitives abstract shapes. Some circles are used to color differently the area.

The physical is a grid of 4x2 frames that can be used to produce a 8 frames loop video.

As always, it's by making a lot of prototypes that we can verify plotting constraints. I take this opportunity to share a series of reveals that will show main features of "Plottable Field (8 frames)" – my next plottable generative art on fx(hash) platform.

prev.content:
This plot reveals a new generator called "Field". The primitive presented here is the usage of a parametric curve. 2 inks are used.

The physical is a grid of 4x2 frames that can be used to produce a 8 frames loop video.

As always, it's by making a lot of prototypes that we can verify plotting constraints. I take this opportunity to share a series of reveals that will show main features of "Plottable Field (8 frames)" – my next plottable generative art on fx(hash) platform.

next.content:
This plot reveals a new generator called "Field". The primitive presented here is a simple square from which lines are thrown following the noise. A grid is also used to create more geometrical shapes.

The physical is a grid of 4x2 frames that can be used to produce a 8 frames loop video.

As always, it's by making a lot of prototypes that we can verify plotting constraints. I take this opportunity to share a series of reveals that will show main features of "Plottable Field (8 frames)" – my next plottable generative art on fx(hash) platform.
